author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry

text.2: þeodnes þegnas.      No hira þrym alæg
text.4: syððan hie gedældon,      swa him dryhten sylf,
text.6: þæt wæron mære      men ofer eorðan,
text.8: rofe rincas,      þonne rond ond hand
text.10: on meotudwange.      Wæs hira Matheus sum,
text.11: se mid Iudeum ongan      godspell ærest
text.14: ut on þæt igland      þær ænig þa git
text.16: blædes brucan.      Oft him bonena hand
text.18: Eal wæs þæt mearcland      morðre bewunden,
text.20: hæleða eðel.      Næs þær hlafes wist
text.21: werum on þam wonge,      ne wæteres drync
text.22: to bruconne,      ah hie blod ond fel,
text.24: ðegon geond þa þeode.      Swelc wæs þeaw hira
text.27: þara þe þæt ealand      utan sohte.
text.28: Swylc wæs þæs folces      freoðoleas tacen,
text.29: unlædra eafoð,      þæt hie eagena gesihð,
text.36: þæt hie ne murndan      æfter mandreame,
text.37: hæleþ heorogrædige,      ac hie hig ond gærs
text.39: þa wæs Matheus      to þære mæran byrig
text.40: cumen in þa ceastre.      þær wæs cirm micel
text.44: Eodon him þa togenes,      garum gehyrsted,
text.47: Hie þam halgan þær      handa gebundon
text.49: hæleð hellfuse,      ond his heafdes segl
text.50: abreoton mid billes ecge.      Hwæðre he in breostum þa git
text.52: þeah ðe he atres drync      atulne onfenge.
text.53: Eadig ond onmod,      he mid elne forð
text.56: of carcerne.      Him wæs Cristes lof
text.61: weoruda wilgeofan,      ond þus wordum cwæð:
text.65: georn on mode;      nu ðurh geohða sceal
text.66: dæde fremman      swa þa dumban neat.
text.69: Gif þin willa sie,      wuldres aldor,
text.71: sweordum, aswebban,      ic beo sona gearu
text.72: to adreoganne      þæt ðu, drihten min,
text.75: Forgif me to are,      ælmihtig god,
text.76: leoht on þissum life,      þy læs ic lungre scyle,
text.82: fæste fyrhðlufan,      ond þe, fæder engla,
text.84: ðæt ðu me ne gescyrige      mid scyldhetum,
text.87: æfter þyssum wordum      com wuldres tacen
text.89: to þam carcerne.      þær gecyðed wearð
text.97: under swegle.      Ne beo ðu on sefan to forht,
text.98: ne on mode ne murn.      Ic þe mid wunige
text.99: ond þe alyse      of þyssum leoðubendum,
text.100: ond ealle þa menigo      þe þe mid wuniað
text.104: torht ontyned.      þær ðu tyres most,
text.106: Geþola þeoda þrea!      Nis seo þrah micel
text.110: to hleo ond to hroðre      in þas hæðenan burg.
text.111: He ðe alyseð      of þyssum leodhete.
text.112: Is to þære tide      tælmet hwile
text.113: emne mid soðe      seofon ond twentig
text.114: nihtgerimes,      þæt ðu of nede most,
text.117: Gewat him þa se halga      helm ælwihta,
text.119: eðelrice.      He is on riht cyning,
text.129: þa þe on carcerne      clommum fæste
text.131: hwylcne hie to æte      ærest mihton
text.133: Hæfdon hie on rune      ond on rimcræfte
text.139: meotudes mildse.      Oft hira mod onwod
text.151: ond þonne todælan      duguðe ond geogoðe,
text.152: werum to wiste      ond to wilþege,
text.154: grædige guðrincas,      hu þæs gastes sið
text.156: Swa hie symble ymb þritig      þing gehedon
text.160: þa wæs gemyndig,      se ðe middangeard
text.162: hu he in ellþeodigum      yrmðum wunode,
text.163: belocen leoðubendum,      þe oft his lufan adreg
text.166: wiðstod stranglice.      þa sio stefn gewearð
text.167: gehered of heofenum,      þær se halga wer
text.172: weoruda drihten,      ond þus wordum cwæð:
text.176: morðorcræftum.      Swa is þære menigo þeaw
text.177: þæt hie uncuðra      ængum ne willað
text.182: ðær ic seomian wat      þinne sigebroðor
text.184: Nu bið fore þreo niht      þæt he on þære þeode sceal
text.189: "Hu mæg ic, dryhten min,      ofer deop gelad
text.192: wuldres waldend,      swa ðu worde becwist?
text.193: ðæt mæg engel þin      eað geferan,
text.194: halig of heofenum      con him holma begang,
text.197: wegas ofer widland.      Ne synt me winas cuðe,
text.198: eorlas elþeodige,      ne þær æniges wat
text.206: ðæt sio ceaster hider      on þas cneorisse
text.209: gif hit worde becwið      wuldres agend.
text.210: Ne meaht ðu þæs siðfætes      sæne weorðan,
text.211: ne on gewitte to wac,      gif ðu wel þencest
text.213: treowe tacen.      Beo ðu on tid gearu;
text.214: ne mæg þæs ærendes      ylding wyrðan.
text.215: ðu scealt þa fore geferan      ond þin feorh beran
text.216: in gramra gripe,      ðær þe guðgewinn
text.220: emne to morgene,      æt meres ende
text.221: ceol gestigan      ond on cald wæter
text.223: ofer middangeard      mine, þær ðu fere!"
text.224: Gewat him þa se halga      healdend ond wealdend,
text.230: aboden in burgum,      ne wæs him bleað hyge,
text.233: gearo, guðe fram,      to godes campe.
text.234: Gewat him þa on uhtan      mid ærdæge
text.236: þriste on geþance,      ond his þegnas mid,
text.238: beoton brimstreamas.      Se beorn wæs on hyhte,
text.239: syðþan he on waruðe      widfæðme scip
text.246: sittan siðfrome,      swylce hie ofer sæ comon.
text.247: þæt wæs drihten sylf,      dugeða wealdend,
text.248: ece ælmihtig,      mid his englum twam.
text.251: þonne hie on flodes fæðm      ofer feorne weg
text.253: Hie ða gegrette,      se ðe on greote stod,
text.260: swa þæt ne wiste,      se ðe þæs wordes bad,
text.262: þe he þær on waroðe      wiðþingode:
text.264: feorran geferede.      Us mid flode bær
text.268: wære bewrecene,      swa us wind fordraf."
text.270: "Wolde ic þe biddan,      þeh ic þe beaga lyt,
text.272: þæt ðu us gebrohte      brante ceole,
text.274: on þære mægðe.      Bið ðe meorð wið god,
text.275: þæt ðu us on lade      liðe weorðe."
text.280: ah in þære ceastre      cwealm þrowiað,
text.281: þa ðe feorran þyder      feorh gelædaþ,
text.282: ond þu wilnast nu      ofer widne mere
text.283: þæt ðu on þa fægðe      þine feore spilde."
text.286: mycel modes hiht,      to þære mæran byrig,
text.287: þeoden leofesta,      gif ðu us þine wilt
text.293: efne to þam lande      þær þe lust myneð
text.301: welan ne wiste      ne wira gespann,
text.302: landes ne locenra beaga,      þæt ic þe mæge lust ahwettan,
text.303: willan in worulde,      swa ðu worde becwist."
text.304: Him þa beorna breogo,      þær he on bolcan sæt,
text.310: Nafast þe to frofre      on faroðstræte
text.312: drync to dugoðe.      Is se drohtað strang
text.316: "Ne gedafenað þe,      nu þe dryhten geaf
text.321: oncnawe cuðlice,      swa þæt Crist bebead,
text.323: gecoren to cempum.      He is cyning on riht,
text.326: swa he ealle befehð      anes cræfte,
text.328: sigora selost.      He ðæt sylfa cwæð,
text.329: fæder folca gehwæs,      ond us feran het
text.332: emne swa wide      swa wæter bebugeð,
text.335: ofer foldan fæðm.      Ic eow freoðo healde.
text.336: Ne ðurfan ge on þa fore      frætwe lædan,
text.337: gold ne seolfor.      Ic eow goda gehwæs
text.338: on eowerne agenne dom      est ahwette.'
text.339: Nu ðu seolfa miht      sið userne
text.340: gehyran hygeþancol.      Ic sceal hraðe cunnan
text.341: hwæt ðu us to duguðum      gedon wille."
text.343: "Gif ge syndon þegnas      þæs þe þrym ahof
text.344: ofer middangeard,      swa ge me secgaþ,
text.345: ond ge geheoldon þæt eow      se halga bead,
text.346: þonne ic eow mid gefean      ferian wille
text.347: ofer brimstreamas,      swa ge benan sint."
text.351: ða ofer yða geswing      Andreas ongann
text.353: wuldres aldor,      ond þus wordum cwæð:
text.355: willan in worulde      ond in wuldre blæd,
text.356: meotud manncynnes,      swa ðu me hafast
text.358: Gesæt him þa se halga      helmwearde neah,
text.359: æðele be æðelum.      æfre ic ne hyrde
text.364: ece ælmihtig,      heht his engel gan,
text.367: þæt hie þe eað mihton      ofer yða geþring
text.370: glad geond garsecg,      ond se græga mæw
text.378: þara þe mid Andreas      on eagorstream
text.379: ceol gesohte.      Næs him cuð þa gyt
text.381: Him þa se halga      on holmwege
text.384: ricum ræsboran,      þa he gereordod wæs:
text.387: weoruda waldend,      ond þe wist gife,
text.388: heofonlicne hlaf,      swa ðu hyldo wið me
text.399: aras on earde,      hwænne ðu eft cyme."
text.400: Edre him þa eorlas      agefan ondsware,
text.402: ðæt hie forleton      æt lides stefnan
text.403: leofne lareow      ond him land curon:
text.406: synnum wunde,      gif we swicað þe?
text.407: We bioð laðe      on landa gehwam,
text.411: hlaforde æt hilde,      þonne hand ond rond
text.418: rece þa gerynu,      hu he reordberend
text.419: lærde under lyfte.      Lang is þes siðfæt
text.421: mæcgas on mode.      Mycel is nu gena
text.422: lad ofer lagustream,      land swiðe feorr
text.424: grund wið greote.      God eaðe mæg
text.428: "Ge þæt gehogodon,      þa ge on holm stigon,
text.429: þæt ge on fara folc      feorh gelæddon,
text.430: ond for dryhtnes lufan      deað þrowodon,
text.432: sawle gesealdon.      Ic þæt sylfa wat,
text.437: Swa gesælde iu,      þæt we on sæbate
text.443: of brimes bosme      on bates fæðm
text.448: miltsa to mærum.      þa seo menigo ongan
text.449: clypian on ceole,      cyning sona aras,
text.453: merestreama gemeotu.      ða ure mod ahloh
text.454: syððan we gesegon      under swegles gang
text.457: Forþan ic eow to soðe      secgan wille,
text.459: eorl on eorðan,      gif his ellen deah."
text.466: hreoh holmþracu.      þa þam halgan wearð
text.475: bene biddan,      þeah ic þe beaga lyt,
text.479: begitan godne.      þæs ðu gife hleotest,
text.482: este wyrðest.      Wolde ic anes to ðe,
text.484: ðæt ðu me getæhte,      nu þe tir cyning
text.488: Ic wæs on gifeðe      iu ond nu þa
text.492: swa ic æfre ne geseah      ænigne mann,
text.495: beateþ brimstæðo.      Is þes bat ful scrid,
text.497: glideð on geofone.      Ic georne wat
text.498: þæt ic æfre ne geseah      ofer yðlade
text.500: Is þon geliccost      swa he on landsceare
text.501: stille stande,      þær hine storm ne mæg,
text.503: brecan brondstæfne,      hwæðere on brim snoweð
text.504: snel under segle.      ðu eart seolfa geong,
text.510: "Oft þæt gesæleð,      þæt we on sælade,
text.511: scipum under scealcum,      þonne sceor cymeð,
text.514: gesæleð on sæwe,      þeh we sið nesan,
text.517: lungre gelettan:      ah him lifes geweald,
text.518: se ðe brimu bindeð,      brune yða
text.519: ðyð ond þreatað.      He þeodum sceal
text.520: racian mid rihte,      se ðe rodor ahof
text.524: engla eðel      þurh his anes miht.
text.526: cuð oncnawen,      þæt ðu cyninges eart
text.529: garsecges begang,      þæt ðu gife hæfdes
text.533: seoðþan hie ongeton      þæt ðe god hæfde
text.538: wuldres waldend,      ond þus wordum cwæð:
text.540: dryhten hælend!      A þin dom lyfað!
text.541: Ge neh ge feor      is þin nama halig,
text.545: ðætte areccan mæg      oððe rim wite
text.549: þæt ðu þissum hysse      hold gewurde
text.552: Ic æt efenealdum      æfre ne mette
text.554: Him ða of ceole oncwæð      cyninga wuldor,
text.556: "Saga, þances gleaw      þegn, gif ðu cunne,
text.557: hu ðæt gewurde      be werum tweonum,
text.561: no ðær gelyfdon      in hira liffruman,
text.562: grome gealgmode,      þæt he god wære,
text.563: þeah ðe he wundra feala      weorodum gecyðde,
text.564: sweotulra ond gesynra.      Synnige ne mihton
text.565: oncnawan þæt cynebearn,      se ðe acenned wearð
text.566: to hleo ond to hroðre      hæleða cynne,
text.568: word ond wisdom,      ah he þara wundra a,
text.573: þæt ðu ne gehyrde      hælendes miht,
text.574: gumena leofost,      hu he his gif cyðde
text.576: Sealde he dumbum gesprec,      deafe gehyrdon,
text.581: Swa he on grundwæge      gumena cynnes
text.583: worde awehte.      Swylce he eac wundra feala
text.584: cynerof cyðde      þurh his cræftes miht.
text.586: win of wætere      ond wendan het,
text.587: beornum to blisse,      on þa beteran gecynd.
text.588: Swylce he afedde      of fixum twam
text.589: ond of fif hlafum      fira cynnes
text.593: menn on moldan,      swa him gemedost wæs.
text.594: Nu ðu miht gehyran,      hyse leofesta,
text.595: hu us wuldres weard      wordum ond dædum
text.596: lufode in life,      ond þurh lare speon
text.597: to þam fægeran gefean,      þær freo moton,
text.599: þa ðe æfter deaðe      dryhten secað."
text.600: ða gen weges weard      wordhord onleac,
text.602: "Miht ðu me gesecgan,      þæt ic soð wite,
text.603: hwæðer wealdend þin      wundor on eorðan,
text.604: þa he gefremede      nalas feam siðum,
text.609: ðæt hie for æfstum      inwit syredon
text.612: wraðum wærlogan.      Hie seo wyrd beswac,
text.613: forleolc ond forlærde.      Nu hie lungre sceolon,
text.617: "Secge ic ðe to soðe      ðæt he swiðe oft
text.619: wundor æfter wundre      on wera gesiehðe,
text.621: folcræd fremede,      swa he to friðe hogode."
text.624: maga mode rof,      mægen þa he cyðde,
text.625: deormod on digle,      ða mid dryhten oft,
text.629: wordum wrætlicum,      ond þe wyrda gehwære
text.631: ða git him wæges weard      wiðþingode:
text.632: "Ne frine ic ðe for tæle      ne ðurh teoncwide
text.633: on hranrade,      ac min hige blissað,
text.635: æðelum ecne.      Ne eom ic ana ðæt,
text.636: ac manna gehwam      mod bið on hyhte,
text.637: fyrhð afrefred,      þam þe feor oððe neah
text.638: on mode geman      hu se maga fremede,
text.641: engla eðel      þurh þa æðelan miht."
text.643: "Nu ic on þe sylfum      soð oncnawe,
text.647: nu ic þe sylfum      secgan wille
text.648: oor ond ende,      swa ic þæs æðelinges
text.649: word ond wisdom      on wera gemote
text.650: þurh his sylfes muð      symle gehyrde.
text.660: Swa gesælde iu      þæt se sigedema
text.661: ferde, frea mihtig.      Næs þær folces ma
text.664: geteled tireadige.      He wæs twelfta sylf.
text.665: þa we becomon      to þam cynestole,
text.671: wroht webbade.      He on gewitte oncneow
text.675: 'Hwæt, ge syndon earme      ofer ealle menn!
text.680: secgað soðlice      þæt mid suna meotudes
text.681: drohtigen dæghwæmlice.      þæt is duguðum cuð
text.683: He wæs afeded      on þysse folcsceare,
text.686: fæder ond modur,      þæs we gefrægen habbað
text.688: Syndon him on æðelum      oðere twegen
text.694: yfel endeleas,      þær hit ær aras.
text.695: þa se þeoden gewat      þegna heape
text.698: He þurh wundra feala      on þam westenne
text.699: cræfta gecyðde      þæt he wæs cyning on riht
text.706: getrume mycle,      þæt he in temple gestod,
text.709: synnige ne swulgon,      þeah he soðra swa feala
text.710: tacna gecyðde,      þær hie to segon.
text.713: geseh, sigora frea,      on seles wage,
text.718: in þære ceastre is.      Cheruphim et Seraphim
text.726: þa gen worde cwæð      weoruda dryhten,
text.731: wlitig of wage,      ond word sprece,
text.733: eorlas on cyððe),      hwæt min æðelo sien.'
text.734: Ne dorste þa forhylman      hælendes bebod
text.735: wundor fore weorodum,      ac of wealle ahleop,
text.736: frod fyrngeweorc,      þæt he on foldan stod,
text.737: stan fram stane.      Stefn æfter cwom,
text.746: godes ece bearn,      þone þe grund ond sund,
text.747: heofon ond eorðan      ond hreo wægas,
text.750: þis is se ilca      ealwalda god
text.756: þæt of his cynne      cenned sceolde
text.757: weorðan wuldres god.      Is seo wyrd mid eow
text.768: weoll on gewitte,      weorm blædum fag,
text.772: ða se þeoden bebead      þryðweorc faran,
text.778: beodan Habrahame      mid his eaforum twæm
text.784: hwylcne hie god mihtum      ongiten hæfdon.
text.785: Gewat he þa feran,      swa him frea mihtig,
text.787: ofer mearcpaðu,      þæt he on Mambre becom
text.788: beorhte blican,      swa him bebead meotud,
text.793: Iacob of greote      to godes geþinge,
text.794: sneome of slæpe þæm fæstan.      Het hie to þam siðe gyrwan,
text.795: faran to frean dome.      Sceoldon hie þam folce gecyðan
text.798: hwær se wealdend wære      þe þæt weorc staðolade.
text.799: Ne dorston þa gelettan      leng owihte
text.800: wuldorcyninges word.      Geweotan ða ða witigan þry
text.801: modige mearcland tredan.      Forlætan moldern wunigean
text.802: open eorðscræfu,      woldon hie ædre gecyðan
text.803: frumweorca fæder.      þa þæt folc gewearð
text.806: Hie ða ricene het      rices hyrde
text.809: ond þæs to widan feore      willum neotan.
text.810: Nu ðu miht gehyran,      hyse leofesta,
text.811: hu he wundra worn      wordum cyðde,
text.812: swa þeah ne gelyfdon      larum sinum
text.813: modblinde menn.      Ic wat manig nu gyt
text.814: mycel mære spell      ðe se maga fremede,
text.815: rodera rædend,      ða ðu aræfnan ne miht,
text.827: to þære ceastre      þe him cining engla
text.831: swefan on sybbe      under swegles hleo,
text.836: wonn under wolcnum.      þa com wederes blæst,

text.1562: is hit mycle selre,      þæs þe ic soð talige,
text.1563: þæt we hine alysan      of leoðobendum,
text.1565: ond us þone halgan      helpe biddan,
text.1566: geoce ond frofre.      Us bið gearu sona
text.1567: sybb æfter sorge,      gif we secaþ to him."
text.1572: fleow firgendstream,      flod wæs on luste,
text.1574: eorlum oð exle.      þa se æðeling het
text.1578: gleawmod, gode leof.      Him wæs gearu sona
text.1580: Smeolt wæs se sigewang,      symble wæs dryge
text.1581: folde fram flode,      swa his fot gestop.
text.1585: þurh haliges hæs,      hlyst yst forgeaf,
text.1586: brimrad gebad.      þa se beorg tohlad,
text.1587: eorðscræf egeslic,      ond þær in forlet
text.1590: Nalas he þær yðe      ane bisencte,
text.1591: ach þæs weorodes eac      ða wyrrestan,
text.1593: gewiton mid þy wæge      in forwyrd sceacan
text.1594: under eorþan grund.      þa wearð acolmod,
text.1601: "Nu is gesyne      ðæt þe soð meotud,
text.1604: þeodum to helpe.      Is nu þearf mycel
text.1606: þa se halga ongann      hæleð blissigean,
text.1608: "Ne beoð ge to forhte,      þeh þe fell curen
text.1610: witu be gewyrhtum.      Eow is wuldres leoht
text.1611: torht ontyned,      gif ge teala hycgað."
text.1612: Sende þa his bene      fore bearn godes,
text.1614: gumena geogoðe,      þe on geofene ær
text.1623: geonge of greote,      þa ær geofon cwealde.
text.1626: eaforan unweaxne,      ða wæs eall eador
text.1627: leoðolic ond gastlic,      þeah hie lungre ær
text.1631: mundbyrd meotudes.      þa se modiga het,
text.1633: gerwan godes tempel,      þær sio geogoð aras
text.1634: þurh fæder fulwiht      ond se flod onsprang.
text.1636: weras geond þa winburg      wide ond side,
text.1637: eorlas anmode,      ond hira idesa mid,
text.1642: þa wæs mid þy folce      fulwiht hæfen,
text.1643: æðele mid eorlum,      ond æ godes
text.1648: in þære beorhtan byrig      bisceop þam leodum,
text.1651: þeodum on þearfe,      ond þriste bebead
text.1653: feorhræd fremedon.      Sægde his fusne hige,
text.1654: þæt he þa goldburg      ofgifan wolde,
text.1658: þæt wæs þam weorode      weorc to geþoligenne,
text.1659: þæt hie se leodfruma      leng ne wolde
text.1660: wihte gewunian.      þa him wuldres god
text.1662: ond þæt word gecwæð,      weoruda dryhten:
text.1665: weras wif samod.      Hira wop becom,
text.1668: Ne scealt ðu þæt eowde      anforlætan
text.1669: on swa niowan gefean,      ah him naman minne
text.1671: Wuna in þære winbyrig,      wigendra hleo,
text.1673: Syððan ðu mid mildse      minre ferest."
text.1677: word ond wisdom,      syððan wuldres þegn,
text.1679: Lærde þa þa leode      on geleafan weg,
text.1682: to þam halgan ham      heofona rices,
text.1683: þær fæder ond sunu      ond frofre gast
text.1688: þæt wæs Satane      sar to geþolienne,
text.1689: mycel modes sorg,      þæt he ða menigeo geseah
text.1692: to fægeran gefean,      þær næfre feondes ne bið,
text.1694: þa wæron gefylde      æfter frean dome
text.1695: dagas on rime,      swa him dryhten bebead,
text.1696: þæt he þa wederburg      wunian sceolde.
text.1697: Ongan hine þa fysan      ond to flote gyrwan,
text.1701: beaducwealm gebad.      þæt þam banan ne wearð
text.1702: hleahtre behworfen,      ah in helle ceafl
text.1705: ða ic lædan gefrægn      leoda weorode
text.1709: Hie ða gebrohton      æt brimes næsse
text.1711: Stodon him ða on ofre      æfter reotan
text.1712: þendon hie on yðum      æðelinga wunn
text.1715: cleopodon on corðre,      ond cwædon þus:
text.1717: Is his miht ond his æht      ofer middangeard
text.1718: breme gebledsod,      ond his blæd ofer eall
text.1720: wlitige on wuldre      to widan ealdre,
text.1721: ece mid englum.      þæt is æðele cyning!"
